00019 class TilesItepSaturation ;

00023 class TilesItepSaturation : public LCFixedObject<NTISINT,NTISFLO,NTISDBL> {
00024   
00025 public: 
00026   
00029   TilesItepSaturation(int SIPM, float _SipmPixelSat[20], float _PmtMipSat[20]) {
00030 
00031     obj()->setIntVal(0, SIPM);
00032     for(int i=0;i<20;i++){      
00033       obj()->setFloatVal(i, _SipmPixelSat[i]);
00034       obj()->setFloatVal(i+20, _PmtMipSat[i]);
00035     }
00036   }
00037 
00040   TilesItepSaturation(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NTISINT,NTISFLO,NTISDBL>(obj) { } 
00041 
00043   virtual ~TilesItepSaturation  () { /* no op*/  }
00044 
00046   int getSIPMID()   { return obj()->getIntVal(0) ;  } 
00047 
00048   float getSipmPixelSat(unsigned point) {
00049     return obj()->getFloatVal(point);
00050   }
00051   float getPmtMipSat(unsigned point) {
00052     return obj()->getFloatVal(20+point);
00053   }
00054 
00055   /* ITEP FILES
00056 ==>  pixs.dat - number of pixels for saturation curve measurements
00057 ==>  pmts.dat - amount of light for corresponding pixs.dat (mip)
00058   */
00059 
00061   void print(std::ostream& os) ;
00062   
00063   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00064   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00065     return "SiPM_MappingHcal";
00066   } 
00067   
00068   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00069     return "i:SiPM,f:SipmPixelSat[20],f:PmtMipSat[20]"; 
00070   }
00071 
00072 }; // class
